teamamused.server.lib

Class TextAreaHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Handler
      • teamamused.server.lib.TextAreaHandler

  • public class TextAreaHandler
extends java.util.logging.Handler
    A log-handler that writes to a TextArea. Platform.runLater is a means of putting work onto the JavaFX application thread. Anything that modifies with the GUI should be on this thread. In this case, the critical line is textArea.setText(...). Adapted from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10785560/write-logger-message-to-file-and-textarea-while-maintaining-default-behaviour-in
